word_mean: 胃肠外的，不经肠的：不经消化道，而通过其它途径注射的，例如皮下、肌肉内、眶内、囊内、脊柱内、胸骨内、静脉内注射等

sentence.Network_en: Total parenteral nutrition was supplied and the symptoms subsided with weight gain.
sentence.Network_cn: 在给予全静脉营养注射后,体重逐渐恢复,同时腹胀及呕吐的症状亦慢慢改善.

sentence.Network_en: This drug is available for both oral and parenteral administration.
sentence.Network_cn: 本药可供口服或注射用.

sentence.Network_en: The parenteral - nutrition solution is allowed to warm to room temperature before administration.
sentence.Network_cn: 肠外营养液允许在使用前加热到室温.
